The C in RPC means call, so "command" seems redundant (to me).
Thanks! sorry, was just re-pushing a change. Fixing by replacing the opening one with a colon.

I'm not actually sure all these details are needed for a 'reducing memory usage' document, all in all it was simply intended as suggestion to reduce the number :smile: \nBut of course getting it correct instead of having outdated information here is an improvement.
